cola.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a brown sweet soft drink,  or a bottle, can, or glass of this drink
cola.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: (cost of living adjustment) in the US, an increase to people's wages or social security and welfare payments to prevent them being affected by inflation (=the gradual rise in the price of goods etc)
cola.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: abbreviation for COST OF LIVING ADJUSTMENT
